output.name: Siti Hasmah Digital Library (SHDL)

history.establishment: Part of MMU's mission to provide cutting-edge educational infrastructure.
history.honor: Named after Tun Dr. Siti Hasmah Mohd Ali, Malaysia's former First Lady, in recognition of her contributions to education.
history.vision: Combines technology-driven learning spaces with traditional resources.

opening_hours.public_holidays: Closed or limited hours, announced in advance

digital_and_print_resources.books_and_periodicals: 100,000+ volumes, including ICT, engineering, and business topics

technology_enhanced_spaces: Smart study pods for small group discussions
High-performance computers for multimedia and research
research_and_academic_support: Guidance on literature reviews, citations, and academic tools like EndNote or Mendeley
Workshops on research methodology, academic writing, and referencing styles
events_and_community_engagement: Workshops and talks on emerging technologies, research trends, and career development
innovative_features: RFID technology for quick book checkouts
Online catalog for remote access to materials

architecture_and_design.focus: Sustainability, user comfort, and modern aesthetics

output.significance: A model for academic libraries across the region, bridging gaps between physical and virtual learning environments.
